ygData.subject: After all, What are friends for?
ygData.msgSnippet: Itan!  I say to you, Bah!  Humbug!  What are fellow travelers for, if not to help one another out in a pinch?  When I get there, to erudin, and hopefully that
ygData.messageBody:
Itan! I say to you, Bah! Humbug! What are fellow travelers for, if
not to help one another out in a pinch? When I get there, to erudin,
and hopefully that will be soon, whatever you require you shall have!
(After all, the more mentally fortunate should always help those poor
demented, lesser souls such as yourself.) And then, it's off to see the
world. Hopefully when I arrive some more worthies will have joined me,
having themselves been smitten by the same wanderlust that I feel. I
feel now, and always have felt, that a good team, working together can
overcome any obstacle; even the dementia of some of its members, hehe.
Prepare yourself, I am coming!
Zardoz, the Great High Elven Mage
